title: What is the best MIDI keyboard with piano touch? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many choices dependent on your application - whether you want a stage piano, a simple controller, or something with more functions. I'm not up on the latest offerings and your preference will be personal, but all the major players offer products with excellent piano touch through weighted keys - Yamaha, Roland, Kurzweil, etc.   I suggest browsing through their respective product websites and visit a local retailer for some hands-on to determine your preference.
